COHESIVM
========

Welcome to the documentation of

.. rst-class:: center-emphasize

   COHESIVM: *Combinatorial h+/e- Sample Investigation using Voltaic Measurements*

Here, you will find all the information you need to :doc:`install</getting_started/installation>`,
:doc:`configure</getting_started/configuration>`, and :doc:`use</getting_started/basic_usage>` the package. If you
want to learn how to use the Graphical User Interfaces or how to implement your own components, this documentation
has you covered.

Learn more about the project on `GitHub <https://github.com/mxwalbert/cohesivm>`_.
